# restricted

**Type Property**

The app doesn’t have access to home data.

## Declaration

```swift
static var restricted: HMHomeManagerAuthorizationStatus { get }
```

## Recognizing Status Values

- **determined**: The user has set the app’s level of access to home data.
- **authorized**: The app has access to home data.
